output.title: output
output.description:
The action will output a series of availability slots for each room in this JSON format:

[{"availabilityPeriods":[{"availabilityDate":"9/1/2025","availabilityEnd":"2025-09-01T10:00:00.000Z","availabilityStart":"2025-08-31T22:15:00.000Z","durationMinutes":705,"eventId":"a01gK000003EcrhQAC","locationId":"a02gK000000f6KnQAI","locationName":"Alternate Lounge","roomCapacity":25,"roomSize":"Small (under 50)"},{"availabilityDate":"9/2/2025","availabilityEnd":"2025-09-02T16:59:59.000Z","availabilityStart":"2025-09-01T17:00:00.000Z","durationMinutes":1439,"eventId":"a01gK000003EcrhQAC","locationId":"a02gK000000f6KnQAI","locationName":"Alternate Lounge","roomCapacity":25,"roomSize":"Small (under 50)"},{"availabilityDate":"9/3/2025","availabilityEnd":"2025-09-03T16:59:59.000Z","availabilityStart":"2025-09-02T17:00:00.000Z","durationMinutes":1439,"eventId":"a01gK000003EcrhQAC","locationId":"a02gK000000f6KnQAI","locationName":"Alternate Lounge","roomCapacity":25,"roomSize":"Small (under 50)"}],"eventId":"a01gK000003EcrhQAC","locationId":"a02gK000000f6KnQAI","locationName":"Alternate Lounge","roomCapacity":25,"roomSize":"Small (under 50)"}]
